main.name: Tasneem Farag
main.bio: I am very passionate about learning new technologies and advancing my career.  I worked on both back-end and front-end during my job at IBM. After that I decided to focus more on the front-end side of development and I have been working my skills . Currently seeking a software engineer position focused on the front-end
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.degree: Bachelor's degree in Management Information Systems

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: At IBM I worked with two teams. One was product pages where we used Drupal as CMS with PHP and CSS. The other one was page patterns. I worked closely with designers and UX experts to build UI components using React.js , CSS and HTML. In my Jumpstart program I got a smart umbrella patent approved.

projects.title: Todo List
projects.category: Your to go app to get organized!
